repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.9.10-slim@sha256:7167ece363efdfa2f338fb94d0b4f5f4b899d5916f54e24222f56b9682206a8a

ARG groupid=10001
ARG userid=10001

WORKDIR /app/
RUN groupadd --gid $groupid app && \
    useradd -g app --uid $userid --shell /usr/sbin/nologin app

# Install graphviz
RUN DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get update && \
    DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive apt-get --no-install-recommends install -y graphviz make && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

# Install docs-building requirements
COPY ./docs/requirements.txt /tmp
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -U 'pip>=20' && \
    pip install --no-cache-dir -r /tmp/requirements.txt

ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED=1 \
    PYTHONDONTWRITEBYTECODE=1 \
    PYTHONPATH=/app

USER app
